subSections.title: Definitions
Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
{{lang|zh|桔}} was included as the simplified form of {{l|zh|橘}} in the {{w|Second round of simplified Chinese characters|second round of simplification}} in 1977. The current standard in Mainland China, the {{w|Table of General Standard Chinese Characters}} ({{w2|zh|通用规范汉字表}}), does not mention that {{lang|zh|桔}} is a simplification of {{l|zh|橘}}. ''{{w|A Dictionary of Current Chinese}}'' ({{w2|zh|现代汉语词典}}) and the ''Xinhua Dictionary'' ({{w2|zh|新华字典}}) list {{lang|zh|桔}} as a separate entry from {{l|zh|橘}} (unlike other variants, which are usually put beside the main character in parentheses) and define {{lang|zh|桔}} as a common variant for {{l|zh|橘}}, while ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) proscribes the use of {{lang|zh|桔}} as the simplified form of {{l|zh|橘}}.

In Cantonese, {{lang|zh|桔}} is generally used for ''gat<sup>1</sup>'', while {{lang|zh|橘}} is used for ''gwat<sup>1</sup>''.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|柑桔|桔仔|桔仔汁|桔仔餅|金桔仔|金桔}}
